00027 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_StoreGP extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractFinisher {
00028 
00034         public function process() {
00035 
00036                 //store in Session for further use by other plugins
00037                 $this->storeUserGPinSession();
00038 
00039                 //update $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues']
00040                 $this->updateSession();
00041 
00042                 return $this->gp;
00043         }
00044 
00050         protected function storeUserGPinSession() {
00051                 foreach ($this->gp as $key => $value) {
00052                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->fe_user->setKey('ses',$key , $value);
00053                 }
00054         }
00055 
00062         protected function updateSession() {
00063                 session_start();
00064 
00065                 //reset session
00066                 unset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues']);
00067 
00068                 //set the variables in session
00069                 //no need to seperate steps in finishers, so simply store to step 1
00070                 foreach($this->gp as $key=>$value) {
00071                         $_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'][1][$key] = $value;
00072                 }
00073         }
00074 
00075 }
00076 ?>
